import { getAllContents } from '../lib/api' import Content from '../types/content' import { AboutProgram } from '../components/AboutProgram' import { AboutTheScholarship } from '../components/AboutTheScholarship' import { LearningOutcomes } from '../components/LearningOutcomes' import { PersonalDevelopment } from '../components/PersonalDevelopment' import { Layout } from '../components/Layout' import ContentType from '../types/content' import markdownToHtml from '../lib/markdownToHtml' interface NormalizedObject { [slug:string]:ContentType } type Props = { allContents:NormalizedObject } const Index:React.FC = ({allContents}) => { return (

Apply Now

Put the potentially record low maximum sea ice extent tihs year down to low ice. According to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, Ted, Scambos.

) } export default Index export async function getStaticProps() { const allContentsNoHtml = getAllContents([ 'title', 'image', 'content' ]) console.log({allContentsNoHtml}) const keys = Object.keys(allContentsNoHtml) const allContentsWithHtml = await new Promise((resolve) =>{ keys.forEach((key,index) =>{ console.log({key,index}) const currentObject = allContentsNoHtml[key] console.log({currentObject}) let newContents:NormalizedObject = {} markdownToHtml(currentObject.content).then((html) =>{ newContents = {...newContents,[key]:{...currentObject,content:html}} if(index === keys.length ){ resolve(newContents) } }) }) }) console.log({allContentsWithHtml}) return { props: { allContents:allContentsWithHtml }, } }
